text: Georges Sarre (26 November 1935 – 31 January 2019) was a French politician. He was born in Chénérailles, Creuse. He was the leader of the Citizen and Republican Movement. He was elected MEP in the 1979 European elections and was elected to the French National Assembly for Paris in 1981. Sarre died on 31 January 2019 in Paris from coronary artery disease, aged 83. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from coronary artery disease Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:Creuse Category:MEPs for France
title: Georges Sarre
